Class Relation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mpxj.Relation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectEntityWithMutableUniqueID, ProjectEntityWithUniqueID

    public final class Relation
extends Object
implements ProjectEntityWithMutableUniqueID
    This class represents the relationship between two tasks.
